Package it.unipd.dei.se.index

Class DirectoryIndexer

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.se.index.DirectoryIndexer
public class DirectoryIndexer extends Object
Indexes documents processing a whole directory tree.

1.00
Version:
1.00
Author:
Nicola Ferro

  • Constructor Details

    • DirectoryIndexer

      public DirectoryIndexer(org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer analyzer, org.apache.lucene.search.similarities.Similarity similarity, int ramBufferSizeMB, String indexPath, String docsPath, String extension, String charsetName, long expectedDocs, Class<? extends DocumentParser> dpCls)
      Creates a new indexer.
      Parameters:
      analyzer - the Analyzer to be used.
      similarity - the Similarity to be used.
      ramBufferSizeMB - the size in megabytes of the RAM buffer for indexing documents.
      indexPath - the directory where to store the index.
      docsPath - the directory from which documents have to be read.
      extension - the extension of the files to be indexed.
      charsetName - the name of the charset used for encoding documents.
      expectedDocs - the total number of documents expected to be indexed
      dpCls - the class of the DocumentParser to be used.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the parameters is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the parameters assumes invalid values.

  • Method Details

    • index

      public void index() throws IOException
      Indexes the documents.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong while indexing.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception
      Main method of the class. Just for testing purposes.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments.
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong while indexing.
